title: BMCR13
description: Rejected blister collection bin is full.
reasons_remedies: The blister-reject collection bin is full, and the respective sensor is on.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR13
Error Code 13
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR13
Alarm Message: Rejection Bin full
Description: Rejected blister collection bin is full.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The blister-reject collection bin is full, and the respective sensor is on.
2. Empty blister-reject collection bin.

- Rejection BinLocation
